statements: SELECT * FROM ConflictResolutionTrends;
SELECT id, resolution_type, resolution_date FROM ConflictResolutionTrends ORDER BY resolution_date DESC;
SELECT resolution_type FROM ConflictResolutionTrends WHERE conflict_description LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM ConflictResolutionTrends WHERE resolution_type = 'Negotiation' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, conflict_description FROM ConflictResolutionTrends WHERE resolution_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ConflictResolutionTrends WHERE id = 1
SELECT conflict_description, resolution_type FROM ConflictResolutionTrends WHERE resolution_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT resolution_type, id, resolution_date FROM ConflictResolutionTrends WHERE resolution_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM ConflictResolutionTrends WHERE resolution_type = 'Mediation' OR resolution_type = 'Arbitration'
SELECT MAX(id) AS max_id FROM ConflictResolutionTrends
SELECT * FROM conflict_resolution_trends WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT report_name, resolution_method FROM conflict_resolution_trends WHERE resolution_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT pattern_name, pattern_description FROM conflict_resolution_patterns WHERE pattern_type = 'Conflict';
SELECT report_name, resolution_date FROM conflict_resolution_trends ORDER BY resolution_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM conflict_resolution_patterns WHERE pattern_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM conflict_resolution_trends WHERE resolution_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_name, resolution_method FROM conflict_resolution_trends WHERE resolution_method = 'Negotiation' ORDER BY resolution_date DESC;
SELECT pattern_name, pattern_description FROM conflict_resolution_patterns WHERE pattern_type = 'Behavioral' ORDER BY pattern_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT report_id, report_name FROM conflict_resolution_trends WHERE resolution_method IN ('Mediation', 'Arbitration') AND resolution_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT pattern_id, pattern_name, pattern_type FROM conflict_resolution_patterns WHERE pattern_description LIKE '%conflict%' ORDER BY pattern_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM conflict_resolution_trends;
SELECT id, conflict_type, resolution_method FROM conflict_resolution_trends WHERE resolution_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT pattern_name, pattern_description FROM conflict_patterns ORDER BY pattern_name DESC;
SELECT report_name, report_date, report_data->>'total_conflicts' AS total_conflicts FROM analytics_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM analytics_reports WHERE report_data @> '{"risk_level": "high"}'
SELECT * FROM conflict_resolution_trends ORDER BY resolution_date DESC, conflict_type ASC;
SELECT pattern_name, pattern_description FROM conflict_patterns WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 10;
SELECT report_name, report_date, jsonb_array_elements(report_data->'data') AS data_values FROM analytics_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT resolution_method FROM conflict_resolution_trends WHERE conflict_type = 'Political' AND resolution_method LIKE '%negotiation%';
SELECT * FROM conflict_resolution_trends WHERE resolution_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND conflict_type IN ('Social', 'Economic') ORDER BY conflict_type ASC, resolution_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM conflict_resolution_reports;
SELECT owner_id, owner_name, email FROM report_owners ORDER BY owner_name DESC;
SELECT resolution_type, conflict_description FROM conflict_resolution_reports WHERE report_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT participant_name, role FROM conflict_participants WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT history_id, resolution_date, resolution_detail FROM resolution_history ORDER BY resolution_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM conflict_resolution_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC, resolution_type ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT report_id, report_date, conflict_description FROM conflict_resolution_reports WHERE report_date >= '2021-01-01' AND conflict_description LIKE '%urgent%'
SELECT owner_name, email FROM report_owners WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com'
SELECT participant_name, role FROM conflict_participants WHERE role = 'Lead' ORDER BY participant_name ASC
SELECT r.report_id, r.report_date, rh.resolution_date FROM conflict_resolution_reports r JOIN resolution_history rh ON r.report_id = rh.report_id
SELECT * FROM ConflictResolutionTrends;
SELECT id, report_date, resolution_type FROM ConflictResolutionTrends WHERE resolution_type = 'Non-violent';
SELECT trend_id, analysis_date, trend_pattern FROM ResolutionAnalytics ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT pattern_name, pattern_description FROM TrendPatterns WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT detail_type, detail_description FROM ResolutionDetails WHERE resolution_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM ConflictResolutionTrends;
SELECT resolution_type, conflict_description FROM ConflictResolutionTrends WHERE report_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT resolution_type, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM ConflictResolutionTrends GROUP BY resolution_type;
SELECT rt.resolution_type, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM ConflictResolutionTrends rt JOIN ResolutionDetails rd ON rt.id = rd.resolution_id WHERE rd.detail_type = 'TypeA' GROUP BY rt.resolution_type;

SELECT rc.category_name, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM ConflictResolutionTrends rt JOIN ResolutionDetails rd ON rt.id = rd.resolution_id JOIN ConflictCategories rc ON rd.resolution_id = rc.id GROUP BY rc.category_name ORDER BY total_count DESC;
